physical_appearance:This is an embroidered yoke. It is red
 with silver and gold embroided geometric patterns. There is a square hole in the middle of the garment. The garment looks slightly frayed around the edges.

sgcool_label_text:A finely embroidered yoke
 that would have been stitched on to a blouse or tunic
 to be worn by a Sindhi woman.
